rules_text:
This Vehicle's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control and the number of artifact cards in your graveyard.
Crew 2
Salvage {4}{G} [i]({4}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature or Vehicle. Salvage only as a sorcery.)[/i]
